premium.name: premium
premium.description: Parancsok amik a SkyKings Premium-hoz vannak kötve.

base: Ha megveszed a Skykings Premiumot, akkor kapsz pár képességet a Discord szerverünkön,
és feloldasz pár különleges funkciót a boton!
Ezzel támogatsz minket, és segítesz futtatni a botot!
Hogy megvásárold, látogasd meg a https://www.patreon.com/SkyKings oldalt.
perks:
**Discord Funkciók**
➥ Hozzáférés prémium funkciókhoz a boton.
➥ Egy egyedi role.
➥ Hozzáférés a bazaar flipper bothoz.
➥ A saját, egyedi VC-d.

**Botfunkciók szervertulajdonosoknak.**
➥ Nincs limit a guild és rang követelményeken.
➥ Gyorsabb eseményfrissítés (6 óra -> 1 hour).
➥ Guild Tagszámláló.
➥ Guild vs Guild események.
➥ Több hamarosan...

fromUser: Ezen a szerveren prémium van {redeemed_by.mention} óta ({redeemed_by}) által.
fromCode: Ez a szerver felhasznált egy prémium kódot és aktív prémiumja lesz {exp} EXP-ig.
admin: Ennek a szervernek örök prémiumot adott egy Skykings adminisztrátor.

premium transfer.name: átruházás
premium transfer.description: Átruházza a prémium feliratkozást erre a szerverre..

cooldown: Át tudod ruházni a prémiumot {when} után.
transferSuccess: Premium átruházva! A **{guild.name}** nevű guild már aktív prémiummal rendelkezik.

options.name: kód
options.description: A felhasználandó kód.

redeemed: A **{guild.name}** nevű guild már aktív prémiummal rendelkezik {when}-ig.

uptime.name: működési-idő
uptime.description: Mutatja a bot működési idejét a legutóbbi újraindítás óta.

invite: [Click here]({url}) hogy meghívd a botot a szerverre.

info.name: info
info.description: Mutat pár információt és statisztikát a botról.

title: SkyKings v{version}

pong:
**Pong!**
Pihenő API lappangási idő: {latency:,} ms
Átlagos Websocket lappangási idő : {avg_ws_latency:,} ms
Szilánk Websocket lappangási idő: {shard_latency:,} ms

votes.name: szavazatok
votes.description: Megjeleníti a bot top szavazóit ebben a hónapban.

title: Bot Szavazatok
noVotes: Nem voltak szavazatok ebben a hónapban.

options.name: esemény
options.description: Az indítandó esemény típusa.

options.name: időtartam
options.description: Az esemény időtartama, mindenképp 1 nap és 14 nap között kell lennie. Például: 1w 3d

options.name: gvg
options.description: Itt állíthatod be, hogy GvG (Guild versus Guild) legyen az esemény. Ehhez a lehetőséghez prémiummal kell rendelkezni.

options.name: csatorna
options.description: A csatorna, ahol az esemény menni fog. Alaphelyzetben a jelenlegi csatornáról indul.

options.name: role
options.description: A role, ami meg lesz pingelve az esemény kezdetén.

options.name: event_beosztás
options.description: Itt állíthatod be, hogy az esemény regisztrálva legyen a Discorddal.

eventStartedNotScheduled: Sajnos, nem voltam képes regisztrálni az eseményt a Discorddal.
invalidDuration: Például írhatod azt, hogy '1w 3d' egy 1 hét 3 nap hosszú esemény esetén.
durationLimited: Egy esemény minium 1 napig, maximum 14 napig tarthat.

eventEnded: Sikeresen beosztottad az eseményt, hogy véget érjen.
Ez időbe telhet, attól függően, hogy hány játékos indult és, hogy milyen nagy az esemény várólistája.

eventDeleteConfirm: Biztos vagy benne, hogy törölni szeretnéd az eseményt?
Ez el fog tüntetni minden adatot, ami az eseményhez köthető és nem visszacsinálható.

eventJoined: Sikeresen csatlakoztál az eseménybe a **{ctx.guild.name}** nevű guild színeiben!

eventLeft: Sikeresen elhagytad az eseményt a **{ctx.guild.name}** nevű guild színeiben!

notLinked: **{name}** does not have a Discord account associated with them in their Hypixel social menu.
To learn how to add your Discord account to your Hypixel social menu, try the `/verify help` command.
notVerified: **{name}**'s associated Discord account is not identical to yours.
To learn how to add your Discord account to your Hypixel social menu, try the `/verify help` command.
alreadyVerified: **{name}** is already verified with <@{userid}>. Verifying on this account will remove that link.
verified: **{name}** has been linked to your Discord account.

verify help.name: help
verify help.description: Learn how to add your Discord account to your Hypixel social menu.

title: Verification Instructions
description:
To link your Minecraft account to your Discord account:
**1)** In any Hypixel lobby, right click the "My Profile" item in your 2nd hotbar slot.
**2)** Select "Social Media", to the right of the Redstone Block.
**3)** Select "Discord".
**4)** Paste your Discord username ({name}) into chat. __This is case sensitive.__
**5)** If a book pops up, select "I understand".
**6)** Use the `/verify link` command to connect your Minecraft account to your Discord account.
Note that it may take up to 5 minutes for the API to reflect your changes.

For a video example, click [here](https://youtu.be/6ZXaZ-chzWI).

verify sync.name: sync
verify sync.description: Synchronize your Discord account with Hypixel's social menu.

syncedPartially: Some roles or your nickname were not changed due to permission issues.
Please contact a server administrator for more information.

unverified: You have been unlinked from your Minecraft account, **{name}**.

*.note: Catches all errors that aren't here.
message:
An unhandled error occured. This has been reported.

{e.__class__.__name__}: {e}

HTTP-500.note: Raised on an HTTP 500 range error.

0.note: Raised in config edit if an invalid option is chosen.
message: {option} is not a valid option.

1.note: Raised in config edit if an invalid value is chosen.
message: {value} is not a valid value for that option.

2.note: Raised if an un-assignable role is chosen and can't be used.
message: {role.mention} cannot be used because it's managed and cannot be assigned.
Please try a different role.

3.note: Raised when adding guilds if the guild already exists.
message: That guild has already been linked to this server.

4.note: Raised when trying to edit a guild that doesnt exist in the database.
message: That guild has not been added to this server.

5.note: Raised when adding a guild rank that already exists.
message: That rank has already been linked to a role.

6.note: Raised when trying to edit a guild rank that doesnt exist in the database.
message: That rank has not been added to this server.

7.note: Raised when trying to add a guild requirement that already exists in the database.
message: That requirement has already been added to this guild.

8.note: Raised when trying to manage a guild requirement that doesn't exist in the database.
message: That requirement has not been added to this guild.

9.note: Raised when trying to add a rank requirement that already exists in the database.
message: That requirement has already been added to this rank.

10.note: Raised when trying to manage a rank requirement that doesn't exist in the database.
message: That requirement has not been added to this rank.

11.note: Raised when the maximum value for a requirement is exceeded.
message: The maximum value of {maximum:,} for the {requirement} requirement has been exceeded.

12.note: Raised when trying to redeem premium on a guild that already has it active.
message: This server already has premium active.

13.note: Raised when trying to redeem a premium code on a guild that has premium from a user.
message: This server has premium active from a SkyKings Premium member.
Premium codes cannot be redeemed in this server.

14.note: Raised when trying to use a nonexistant premium code.
message: This premium code is not valid.

15.note: Raised when trying to start an event when one is running.
message: There's already an event running in this server.
If it's already ended, you can forcefully delete it with the `/event delete` command.

16.note: Raised when trying to use a premium feature without premium.
message: SkyKings Premium is required to perform that action.
For more information, please see `/premium info`.

17.note: Raised when the bot does not have permission to send messages.
message: I don't have permission to send messages in the specified channel.

18.note: Raised when the player argument is required but was not passed.
message: You must provide a player to search for as you are not verified.

19.note: Raised when an invalid event is passed.
message: **{event}** is not a valid event.

20.note: Raised when an event is already enabled.
message: That event is already enabled.

21.note: Raised when an event is already disabled.
message: That event is already disabled.

22.note: Raised when an invalid alert time is passed. (skyblock events config)
message: **{time}** is not a valid time. It must be **0**, **5**, **10**, or **30**.

23.note: Raised when an alert is already enabled. (skyblock events config)
message: That alert is already enabled.

24.note: Raised when an alert is already disabled. (skyblock events config)
message: That alert is already disabled.

25.note: Raised when a player doesn't have any SkyBlock profiles to fetch.
message: **{name}** has no SkyBlock profiles.

0.note: Raised when a user doesn't have premium and needs it.
message: You need SkyKings Premium to use this command.
For more information, please see `/premium info`.

1.note: Raised when an event is already running.
message: There's already an event running in this server.

2.note: Raised when an event is not running.
message: There isn't an event running in this server.

3.note: Raised when the command invoker is not verified.
message: You must be verified to use this command.
You can verify with `/verify`.

4.note: Raised when the command invoker is already verified.
message: You're already verified.

5.note: Raised when the command invoker is already in the event.
message: You're already in the event.

6.note: Raised when the command invoker is not in the event.
message: You're not in the event. Join it with `/event join`.

7.note: Raised when the command invoker does not have permissions.
message: You do not have permission to run this command.

8.note: Raised when trying to use a premium feature without premium.
message: SkyKings Premium is required to perform that action.
For more information, please see `/premium info`.

player: The specified player does not exist.

startMessage:
{created_by.mention} started a{n} {gvg}{event} event! Here's how it works:
1. You join the event,
2. The bot starts tracking the XP you earn,
3. You get placed on the leaderboard accordingly.
This message will serve as the leaderboard, and will be updated every {when}. Good luck, and have fun!
**This event ends on {end_date} ({end_relative})**
nobody: Nothing to see here! Nobody's in the event!
ended: This event has ended and all data will be deleted {when}.

notVerified: You must be verified to join an event. Verify with the `/verify` command.
noEvent: There isn't an event running in this server.
position: You are currently have {xp:,} {label} in the event and are #{pos:,} out of {players:,} players.

noPages: There are no other pages to switch to!
pageNumberPlaceholder: Input a page number to switch to.

noEndedAuctions: This player has no ended auctions.
noActiveAuctions: This player has no active auctions.

response: Thanks for your feedback. We'll look into the issue and rectify it as soon as possible.
**Abuse of this system will not be tolerated.**

title: SkyCrypt Leaderboards: {leaderboard}

title: Daily Fetchur
yellow_glass_obtain: Can be purchased from the Wool Weaver or crafted.
compass_obtain: Can be crafted with 4 iron ingots and a redstone dust.
mithril_obtain: Can be purchased from the Bazaar or mined.
firework_obtain: Can be crafted with paper and gunpowder.
coffee_obtain: Can be purchased from the Bartender for 1,000 or 5,000 coins.
door_obtain: Can be crafted with 6 wooden planks, or 6 iron ingots.
rabbits_foot_obtain: Can be purchased from the Bazaar or dropped from rabbits.
superboom_obtain: Can be purchased from Ophelia or Walter in the hub, or found as a drop in Dungeons.
pumpkin_obtain: Can be purchased from the Bazaar or Farm Merchant in the hub, or harvested at the Barn.
flint_and_steel_obtain: Can be crafted with a flint and an iron ingot.
quartz_obtain: Can be mined from the Crimson Isle with a Silk Touch pickaxe.
red_wool_obtain: Can be purchased from the Wool Weaver, crafted, or gained with the Rainbow enchantment.

assigned_role: They were assigned the <@&{role}> role automatically.
kicked: They were kicked from the server automatically.
